languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, лишь навигаторам вверен дар править корабли сквозь Имматериум, избегая его кошмарного влияния на команду и судно. Пытаться обуздать варп-пространство без проводника — смертельно опасно!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, лишь Навигаторам вверен дар править корабли сквозь Имматериум, избегая его кошмарного влияния на команду и судно. Пытаться обуздать варп-пространство без проводника — смертельно опасно!"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, лишь навигаторам вверен дар править корабли сквозь Имматериум, избегая его кошмарного влияния на команду и судно. Пытаться обуздать варп-пространство без проводника — смертельно опасно!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium without succumbing to the nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing the warp space without a guide is to perish!"

"Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium without succumbing to the nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing the warp space without a guide is to perish!"

"Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

"Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

"Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les navigateurs sont les seuls à pouvoir guider les vaisseaux dans les limbes de l'Immaterium. Tout autre qu'eux succomberait aux mêmes effets cauchemardesques auxquels l'équipage et les machines sont soumis. Tenter de traverser le Warp sans leur aide relève du suicide ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les navigateurs sont les seuls à pouvoir guider les vaisseaux dans les limbes de l'Immaterium. Tout autre qu'eux succomberait aux mêmes effets cauchemardesques auxquels l'équipage et les machines sont soumis. Tenter de traverser le Warp sans leur aide relève du suicide ! »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, nur die Navigatoren sind mit der Gabe gesegnet, Schiffe durch das Immaterium steuern zu können. Jeder andere würde demselben albtraumhaften Einfluss erliegen, den es auf das Crew und das Schiff ausübt. Ohne Führer durch den Warp zu reisen, wäre ungeheuer töricht!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, nur die Navigatoren sind mit der Gabe gesegnet, Schiffe durch das Immaterium steuern zu können. Jeder andere würde demselben albtraumhaften Einfluss erliegen, den es auf das Crew und das Schiff ausübt. Ohne Führer durch den Warp zu reisen, wäre ungeheuer töricht!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, conducir una nave por el Inmaterio es algo que solo los navegantes tienen la capacidad de hacer. Cualquier otro que lo intentase sucumbiría a los mismos espantosos efectos que afectan tanto a la tripulación como a la nave. ¡Intentar atravesar la disformidad sin un guía es una insensatez!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, conducir una nave por el Inmaterio es algo que solo los navegantes tienen la capacidad de hacer. Cualquier otro que lo intentase sucumbiría a los mismos espantosos efectos que afectan tanto a la tripulación como a la nave. ¡Intentar atravesar la disformidad sin un guía es una insensatez!».

languages.text: “舰长大人，只有受到祝福的导航者带有能力指引舰船穿越亚空间。其他人根本禁受不住亚空间中梦魇般的影响。若是打算在没有导航者的情况下强行穿越亚空间，几乎是痴人说梦！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，只有受到祝福的导航者带有能力指引舰船穿越亚空间。其他人根本禁受不住亚空间中梦魇般的影响。若是打算在没有导航者的情况下强行穿越亚空间，几乎是痴人说梦！”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、非物質世界を通過して船を操縦する才能に恵まれているのは航宙士だけです。それ以外の者は、クルーも船も、悪夢のごとき影響に呑み込まれることでしょう。案内人もいないのに歪みの空間を渡ろうとするのは、愚かな行為です！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、非物質世界を通過して船を操縦する才能に恵まれているのは航宙士だけです。それ以外の者は、クルーも船も、悪夢のごとき影響に呑み込まれることでしょう。案内人もいないのに歪みの空間を渡ろうとするのは、愚かな行為です！」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, gemileri Tindiyar'da yönlendirme yeteneğiyle kutsanmış olanlar yalnızca Rotacılardır. Onların dışındaki herkes, öteboyutun mürettebata ve gemiye yönelttiği kâbusumsu nüfuza yenik düşecektir. Kılavuz olmadan uçsuz uzayda yol almaya teşebbüs etmek, abesle iştigaldir!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, only the Navigators are blessed with the gift of steering ships though the Immaterium. Anyone else would succumb to the same nightmarish influence it projects on the crew and the vessel. To attempt traversing warp space without a guide is a fool's errand!"
